member.name: ISearchContext.GetSearchStyle
member.summary: Overrides the registry settings that determine how an autosearch is performed.
member.param: A pointer to a DWORD value that indicates how the search is performed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISearchContext.GetSearchText
member.summary: Retrieves the text that is in the browser's Address bar.
member.param: The BSTR that receives the text in the Address bar.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISearchContext.GetSearchURL
member.summary: Retrieves the URL that is being searched for.
member.param: The BSTR that receives the URL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISearchContext
member.summary: Exposes methods that channel customization information to the search hooks.
